pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Example```pythonfrom sc_cc_ng_sdk_python import SCNGClientfrom sc_cc_ng_models_python import ContextFilter, ContextRelation, SubContextFilter, ContextTypesdk_call = SCNGClient(url="http://localhost:8001/graphql")tokens_list=[ [ "en-GB", "MY2022", "CT256", "EN06" ]]result = sdk_call( token_list=tokens_list, context_filter=ContextFilter( relation=ContextRelation.ALL, subContextFilters=[ SubContextFilter( contexts=[ ContextType.MODEL, ], relation=ContextRelation.ALL ) ] ))print(result.data)print(result.error)```
